item.title: 哈塞特：美国允许英伟达芯片继续运往中国
item.description: 白宫国家经济顾问凯文-哈塞特（Kevin Hassett）在明显提及英伟达（Nvidia）运往中国的 H20 AI 芯片时说，特朗普总统和他的团队决定放行这些芯片，以阻止中国在芯片竞争中领先。【原文：White House National Economic Adviser Kevin Hassett, in an apparent reference to Nvidia's H20 AI chip shipments to China, said President Trump and his team decided to let the chips go in a bid to stop China from getting ahead in the race for chips.】

item.title: 诺和诺德发布盈利预警后，礼来将迎来强劲的季度业绩
item.description: 投资者和分析师表示，他们预计礼来公司下周公布的季度销售额和利润将强于丹麦竞争对手诺和诺德公司周二公布的数据，他们正焦急地等待着该公司的全年业绩展望和一种试验性肥胖症药物的最新进展，以判断这家美国制药商的长期健康状况。【原文：Investors and analysts say they expect Eli Lilly to report stronger quarterly sales and profit next week than Danish rival Novo Nordisk did on Tuesday, and are anxiously awaiting a full-year outlook and updates on an experimental obesity drug to gauge the U.S. drugmaker's longer-term health.】

item.title: 贝森特称中国谈判 "稳健"，但不包括 TikTok
item.description: 美国财政部长斯科特-贝森特（Scott Bessent）周二表示，美中贸易谈判 "影响深远、稳健且非常令人满意"，但并未提及短视频应用TikTok的未来以及台湾官员的动向。【原文：U.S. Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent on Tuesday said U.S.-China trade talks were "far reaching, robust and highly satisfactory," but the future of the short video app TikTok as well as the movement of Taiwan officials did not come up.】

item.title: 微软将向巴西反垄断监管机构投诉 Opera
item.description: 挪威浏览器制造商Opera将于本周二向巴西反垄断机构CADE投诉美国科技巨头微软，称其Edge浏览器对竞争对手构成不公平优势。【原文：Norwegian browser maker Opera will file a complaint about U.S. tech giant Microsoft to Brazilian antitrust authority CADE on Tuesday for allegedly giving its Edge browser an unfair advantage over rivals.】

item.title: 巴西部长表示，巴西正计划为受美国关税打击的企业提供救济措施
item.description: 巴西财政部长费尔南多-哈达德（Fernando Haddad）周二表示，巴西正计划为受美国将于8月生效的更高关税严重影响的公司提供救济措施。【原文：Brazil is planning relief measures for companies impacted heavily by steeper U.S. tariffs set to take effect in August, Finance Minister Fernando Haddad said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 消息人士称巴西要求美国对食品和巴西航空工业公司飞机免征 50%关税
item.description: 一位熟悉内情的消息人士周二告诉路透社，巴西政府已要求美国将食品和巴西航空工业公司的飞机排除在其计划从 8 月 1 日起对巴西商品征收的 50% 关税之外。【原文：Brazil's government has asked the U.S. to exclude food products and Embraer's aircraft from the 50% tariff it plans to impose on Brazilian goods starting August 1, a source familiar with the matter told Reuters on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国司法部放弃阻止企业旅游公司合并的申请
item.description: 据周二在纽约的法庭记录显示，美国司法部放弃了阻止美国运通全球商旅集团收购 CWT Holdings 的申请。【原文：The U.S. Department of Justice dropped its bid to block American Express Global Business Travel Group's acquisition of CWT Holdings, according to court records entered in New York on Tuesday.】

item.title: 巴西牛肉包装商估计美国加征关税将造成 10 亿美元损失
item.description: 代表 JBS 和 Marfrig 等公司的巴西牛肉包装商游说团体 Abiec 周二估计，如果美国对巴西出口产品征收 50%的关税，巴西将蒙受 10 亿美元的损失。【原文：Brazilian beef-packers' lobby Abiec, which represents companies including JBS and Marfrig , on Tuesday estimated losses of $1 billion if the United States applies a 50% tariff on Brazilian exports.】

item.title: 美国联合航空公司空乘人员投票否决临时协议
item.description: 美国联合航空公司（United Airlines）空乘人员工会表示，该公司空乘人员周二投票拒绝了与航空公司达成的新合同临时协议。【原文：Flight attendants at United Airlines voted on Tuesday to reject the tentative agreement for a new contract with the carrier, their union said.】

item.title: 商务部长称咖啡和可可可在贸易协议中免征关税
item.description: 美国商务部长霍华德-卢特尼克（Howard Lutnick）周二表示，在与生产国达成贸易协议后，包括咖啡和可可在内的非美国本土种植的自然资源可以免除进口关税。【原文：Natural resources that are not grown in the United States, including coffee and cocoa, could be exempt from import tariffs when trade deals with producing countries are reached, U.S. Commerce Secretary Howard Lutnick said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 美国消费者金融监管局称将取代拜登时代的 "开放银行 "法规
item.description: 法庭文件显示，美国消费者金融最高监管机构周二要求联邦法院暂停一项行业诉讼，该诉讼旨在废除拜登政府之前通过的开放银行法规，以便该机构有时间提出新的版本。【原文：The top U.S. watchdog for consumer finance asked a federal court on Tuesday to pause an industry lawsuit seeking to strike down open banking regulations adopted by the prior Biden administration so the agency will have time to put forward a new version, court papers showed.】

item.title: 达能母公司就冷萃咖啡标语和包装起诉 Chobani
item.description: 达能（Dannon）酸奶制造商周二起诉竞争对手乔巴尼（Chobani），称乔巴尼的 "明亮醇香"（Bright & Mellow）口号和黄黑相间的包装被抄袭，用于竞争产品线的即饮冷萃咖啡。【原文：The maker of Dannon yogurt sued rival Chobani on Tuesday for allegedly copying its "Bright & Mellow" slogan and yellow-and-black packaging for a competing line of ready-to-drink cold brew coffee.】

item.title: 特朗普得到关税，美国人得到涨价
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普正在征收关税。各公司正明确表示他们打算如何应对--将关税转嫁给美国消费者。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump is getting his tariffs. Companies are making it clear how they intend to deal with it - passing them on to American consumers.】

item.title: 投资者寻求收益，美国备兑认购基金吸引创纪录资金流入
item.description: 由于关税风险和地缘政治紧张局势持续存在，投资者在寻求更高回报的同时，也希望免受大盘波动的影响，因此美国备兑认购基金今年吸引了大量资金流入。【原文：U.S. covered call funds are drawing robust inflows this year as investors search for higher returns and protection from broader market volatility because of continued tariff risks and geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 墨西哥经济在第二季度实现增长
item.description: 路透社周二的一项民意调查显示，受制造业和服务业增长抵消了农业活动疲软的影响，墨西哥经济在第二季度可能略有回升。【原文：Mexico's economy likely slightly picked up steam in the second quarter, buoyed by growth in the manufacturing and service sectors that offset weakness in agricultural activity, a Reuters poll showed on Tuesday.】

item.title: 全球消费品公司最近的领导层变动
item.description: 宝洁公司周一表示，首席执行官乔恩-默勒（Jon Moeller）在任职四年后将卸任最高职位，他将由首席运营官 Shailesh Jejurikar 接替。【原文：Procter & Gamble said on Monday CEO Jon Moeller is stepping away from the top job after four years in the role, and that he would be succeeded by Chief Operating Officer Shailesh Jejurikar.】

item.title: 解说员：联合太平洋公司收购美国铁路竞争对手的交易面临漫长审查
item.description: 联合太平洋公司收购竞争对手诺福克南方公司（Norfolk Southern）的提议需要获得华盛顿地面运输委员会（Surface Transportation Board）的批准，该委员会是一个独立的联邦机构，负责监督铁路行业的竞争和其他重要领域。【原文：Union Pacific's proposed purchase of smaller rival rail operator Norfolk Southern will need to be approved by the Surface Transportation Board in Washington, an independent federal agency that oversees competition and other areas of importance in the rail industry.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：Palo Alto Networks 接近以 200 多亿美元收购 CyberArk
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，Palo Alto Networks 正在洽谈收购 CyberArk 软件公司，对这家以色列网络安全提供商的估值可能超过 200 亿美元。【原文：Palo Alto Networks is in talks to acquire CyberArk Software potentially valuing the Israeli cybersecurity provider at more than $20 billion, the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国董事会中最不稳定的工作：首席执行官
item.description: 数据显示，随着股东和董事会监督力度的加大，对低于标准的回报或不当行为的容忍度降低，美国公司正在以二十年来最快的速度撤换首席执行官。【原文：U.S. companies are removing their CEOs at the fastest clip in two decades, data shows, as increased scrutiny from shareholders and boards result in reduced tolerance for sub-par returns or wayward conduct.】

item.title: 欧莱雅第二季度销售额增长 2.4
item.description: 欧莱雅（OREP.PA）周二公布的第二季度销售额增长 2.4%，低于预期，原因是欧洲市场的增长放缓幅度超过预期，亚洲旅游市场需求低迷。【原文：L'Oreal OREP.PA reported a 2.4% rise in second-quarter sales on Tuesday, missing forecasts as growth in Europe slowed more than expected and demand at travel outlets in Asia was subdued.】

item.title: Kering 季度销售额低于预期，Gucci 下降 25
item.description: 周二，拥有时尚品牌古驰（Gucci）和圣罗兰（Saint Laurent）的法国开云集团（Kering）报告称，由于奢侈品行业长期低迷，该集团的季度收入下降了 15%，低于市场预期。【原文：Kering , the French group that owns fashion labels Gucci and Saint Laurent, reported on Tuesday a 15% drop in quarterly revenues, falling short of market expectations as the luxury sector grapples with a prolonged slump.】

item.title: 诺和诺德新任首席执行官面对持怀疑态度的投资者，Wegovy 美国销售成为关注焦点
item.description: 诺和诺德（Novo Nordisk）新任首席执行官马齐亚-迈克-杜斯塔尔（Maziar Mike Doustdar）被委以重任，以扭转这家生产Wegovy的公司销售增长乏力、股价下滑的局面。他首先需要赢得持怀疑态度的投资者的支持。【原文：Novo Nordisk's new CEO Maziar Mike Doustdar has been handed the reins to turn around the Wegovy-making firm's flagging sales growth and sliding share price. He first will need to win over sceptical investors.】

item.title: 亚马逊支持的 Skild AI 推出通用人工智能模型，用于多用途机器人
item.description: 由亚马逊公司（Amazon.com）和日本软银集团（SoftBank Group）支持的机器人初创公司 Skild AI 周二发布了一个基础人工智能模型，该模型可在几乎所有机器人上运行--从流水线机器到人形机器人。【原文：Robotics startup Skild AI, backed by Amazon.com and Japan's SoftBank Group , on Tuesday unveiled a foundational artificial intelligence model designed to run on nearly any robot — from assembly-line machines to humanoids.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，瑞银加强应急计划，试图驯服瑞士规则
item.description: 一位知情人士透露，瑞银正在向高级员工通报，自从政府提出新的资本规则以来，研究将总部从瑞士迁出的必要性与日俱增。【原文：UBS is briefing senior staff that the need to examine moving its HQ from Switzerland has grown since the government proposed new capital rules, a source with knowledge of the matter said, while another pointed to London as a favourite alternative.】

item.title: 达飞轮船表示对长江和记的港口码头感兴趣
item.description: 法国航运巨头达飞海运（CMA CGM）周二表示，在香港企业集团与贝莱德（BlackRock）牵头的财团本周结束独家谈判后，该公司有意接管长江和记的部分港口。【原文：French shipping giant CMA CGM said on Tuesday it is interested in taking over some of CK Hutchison 's ports after the Hong Kong conglomerate's exclusive talks ended with a consortium led by BlackRock this week.】

item.title: 惠而浦因关税影响下调预期和股息，股价下滑
item.description: 周二，惠而浦股价暴跌，原因是这家家电制造商在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收关税之前削减了全年盈利预期和股息，并面临竞争对手大量进口的压力。【原文：Whirlpool's shares tumbled on Tuesday after the home appliances maker slashed its full-year earnings forecast and dividend, citing pressure from rivals loading up on imports ahead of U.S. President Donald Trump's tariffs.】

item.title: Prosus 旗下的 iFood 收购巴西 CRMBonus 公司股份
item.description: 荷兰投资集团 Prosus 旗下的巴西食品配送平台 iFood 周二发表声明称，它已获得技术公司 CRMBonus 20% 的股份。【原文：Brazilian food delivery platform iFood, owned by Dutch investment group Prosus , said in a statement on Tuesday it has taken a 20% stake in technology company CRMBonus.】

item.title: 据彭博社报道，雷诺采购主管是首席执行官职位的主要候选人
item.description: 据彭博社周二援引知情人士的话报道，雷诺采购主管弗朗索瓦-普罗沃斯特（Francois Provost）已成为法国汽车制造商首席执行官职位的最热门人选。【原文：Renault procurement chief Francois Provost has emerged as the front-runner for the CEO job at the French automaker, Bloomberg reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国最大的铁路工会打算反对诺福克南方公司与联合太平洋公司合并
item.description: 美国最大的铁路工会 SMART 运输部周二在一份声明中说，该工会打算在美国地面运输委员会的诉讼程序中反对联合太平洋公司以 850 亿美元收购较小的竞争对手诺福克南方公司的提议。【原文：The largest rail union in the United States intends to oppose Union Pacific's proposed $85-billion buy of smaller rival Norfolk Southern in proceedings before the Surface Transportation Board, the union, SMART Transportation Division, said in a statement on Tuesday.】

item.title: 华尔街日报》报道：摩根大通接近达成接管苹果信用卡项目的协议
item.description: 据《华尔街日报》周二援引知情人士的话报道，摩根大通正在就从高盛手中接管苹果信用卡项目进行深入谈判。【原文：JPMorgan Chase is in advanced talks to take over Apple's credit card program from Goldman Sachs , the Wall Street Journal reported on Tuesday, citing people familiar with the matter.】
